title: Tuesday is Our Turn with Tyler Bowyer and Austin Smith
itunes:title: Tuesday is Our Turn with Tyler Bowyer and Austin Smith
description:
It's been a marathon campaign, and we're just now rounding the final turn. In four days America's path could change forever. Charlie dives into a deep conversation with two of our most knowledgeable election experts: Tyler Bowyer, COO of Turning Point Action and Austin Smith, Director at Turning Point Action and Republican nominee for the Arizona House. They remind everyone of what went down in 2020, and give a final jolt to sleepy Republicans everywhere ahead of Tuesday's vote.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
